aston.nabneyit.util

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • aston.nabneyit.util.Layer

  • public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    Groups some units into a layer; this is a convenient way of structuring the factory needed for the coursework.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ian T. Nabney
